forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
